title: GET_VEHICLE_XENON_LIGHTS_CUSTOM_COLOR
content:
0xC715F730// GetVehicleXenonLightsCustomColor
BOOL GET_VEHICLE_XENON_LIGHTS_CUSTOM_COLOR(Vehicle vehicle, int* red, int* green, int* blue);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle handle.red: Red color (0-255).green: Green color (0-255).blue: Blue color (0-255).Returns: A boolean indicating if vehicle have custom xenon lights RGB color.Returns vehicle xenon lights custom RGB color values. Do note this native doesn't return non-RGB colors that was set with _SET_VEHICLE_XENON_LIGHTS_COLOR.
codeBlocks:
// GetVehicleXenonLightsCustomColor
BOOL GET_VEHICLE_XENON_LIGHTS_CUSTOM_COLOR(Vehicle vehicle, int* red, int* green, int* blue);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for GET_VEHICLE_XENON_LIGHTS_CUSTOM_COLOR
GetVehicleXenonLightsCustomColor(vehicle, 0, 0, 0)
